fields.headline: Tickets to ride
fields.bodyText: Six top destinations New York: £165 Icelandair from Heathrow via Reykjavik. Must be booked by January 29. Valid for departures until Feb 28. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum 30 days. Thomas Cook Flights Direct (0870 7520066). Los Angeles: £234 British Airways from Heathrow. Must be booked by Jan 29 and purchased at least three days before departure. Valid for departures until Feb 28. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Trailfinders (020-7937 5400). Amsterdam: £67.80 British Airways from Heathrow. Must be booked by Jan 29. Valid for departures until March 31. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. British Airways (0845 7733377). Sydney: £475 Austrian Airlines or Lauda Air from Heathrow or Manchester via Vienna (then Lauda to Sydney). Must be booked by Jan 19. Full payment required when booking. Valid for departures until April 8. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Airline Network (0800 727747). Hong Kong: £399 Cathay Pacific from Heathrow or Manchester. Must be booked by Jan 31. Full payment required when booking. Valid for departures Feb 1 - 28. Minimum stay three nights, maximum one month. Airline Network (0800 727747). Paris: £81.20 British Airways from Gatwick. Must be booked by Jan 29. Valid for midweek departures until March 24 (£92 at weekends). Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. British Airways (0345 664455). The pick of the rest Phnom Penh: £444 Malaysia Airlines from Heathrow via Kuala Lumpur. Must be booked by Jan 22. Valid for departures Jan 22 - June 15. No minimum stay, maximum 60 days. Bridge the World (0870 4447474). Mexico City: £309* KLM from Heathrow, London City, Stansted, Aberdeen, Birmingham, Manchester, Bristol, Cardiff, Edinburgh, Glasgow, Humberside, Leeds-Bradford, Teesside, Newcastle or Norwich via Amsterdam. Valid for departures until March 31. Minimum stay one Saturday night, maximum one month. Journey Latin America (020-8747 3108). * This fare may alter slightly according to varying taxes at the different airports. And the rail alternative Paris/Brussels: £50 (Lille £45) Same-day return. Must be bought at least one day before travel. Valid for departures on Saturdays and Sundays until Feb 11. Eurostar (0870 518 6186). NB Fares can change rapidly. These were available in reasonable quantities at the time of writing, but they can sell out in a sudden rush.
